dct_title_s: [Series of maps from Murphy's Biblical atlas, containing twenty-four maps, illustrative of scripture geography]
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and pictorially.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
7 bar scales on maps given in "British miles", "Roman miles", "Jewish miles", "Yards", "Cubits", "Romish miles", and "English miles".
Includes 2 indexes: References to Asia Minor -- References.
Bible citations next to sites on maps throughout.
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, travel routes, places of historical interest.
